creditline: Gift of Carol and Jeffrey Horvitz
description: set of 16 nesting bowls, all with celadon glaze; largest bowl (p) has vertical ribs, small round foot and a domed lid (q) with slightly flared knob on top; remaining bowls have plain sides, small round foot; smallest bowl (a) is extremely delicate and tiny; all bowls nested inside a natural wood storage box with lid and plum colored tie

8 1/4 × 6 × 6 in. (21 × 15.2 × 15.2 cm) (nested in largest bowl with lid)
